fields.description_en:
The second initiative of the 5 important initiatives put forward by the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan - "For the purpose of physical training of young people, creation of necessary conditions for them to show their abilities in the field of sports and support, sports competitions are constantly held with the participation of students of the institute. On February 1 of this year, a friendly meeting on mini-football was organized with the participation of students of the Belarus-Uzbekistan joint intersectoral practical technical qualification institute and the students of the Uzbekistan State University of World Languages.

fields.description_uz:
O ºzbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti tomonidan ilgari surilgan 5 ta muhim tashabbusning ikkinchi tashabbusi -“Yoshlarni jismoniy chiniqtirish, ularning sport sohasida qobiliyatini namoyon qilishlari uchun zarur sharoitlar yaratish hamda qo ºllab quvvatlash maqsadida, institut talabalari ishtirokida doimiy ravishda sport musobaqalari o ºtkazib kelinmoqda. Joriy yilning 1 fevral—å kuni Toshkent shahridagi Belarus—å-O ºzbekiston qo ºshma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar instituti talabalari bilan O ºzbekiston davlat jaxon tillari universiteti talabalari ishtirokida mini-futbol bo ºyicha o ºrtoqlik uchrashuvi tashkil etildi.

fields.title_en: The motherland is sacred, it is an honorable duty to protect it
fields.title_uz: Vatan-muqaddas, uni himoya qilish sharafli burch
fields.description_en:
On January 10-14 of this year, January 14 - the 31st anniversary of the establishment of the Armed Forces of the Republic of Uzbekistan and the Day of Defenders of the Fatherland, among the students of the Belarus-Uzbekistan joint interdisciplinary practical technical qualification institute in Tashkent, "The Motherland is holy, protect it" A competition of video clips was held under the slogan "an honorable duty to do". Many students of the institute took part in this competition. According to the results of the competition:

ü•áInnovative project management of industrial enterprises, 1st stage student Abdusamatova, daughter of Diyorakhan Akmalkhan, won 1st place;

ü•àMetrology, standardization and product quality management, 1st stage student Kholboyeva Gulzoda Ikram girl, 2nd place;

ü•â The daughter of Malikova Aziza Abdurakhim, a 3rd-level student of the management of innovative projects of industrial enterprises, took the 3rd place.

We congratulate our students who participated in the competition and won.

SBUMIPTK.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook
fields.description_uz:
Joriy yilning 10-14 yanvar kunlari 14 yanvar - O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Qurolli Kuchlari tashkil etilganligining 31 yilligi hamda Vatan himoyachilari kuni munosabati bilan Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar instituti talabalari orasida “Vatan-muqaddas, uni himoya qilish sharafli burch” shiori ostida videoroliklar tanlovi o‘tkazildi. Mazkur tanlovda institutning ko‘plab talabalari ishtirok etishdi. Tanlov yakunlariga ko‘ra:

ü•áSanoat korxonalarining innovatsion loyihalarini boshqarish ta’lim yo‘nalishi 1-bosqich talabasi Abdusamatova Diyoraxon Akmalxon qizi 1- o‘rinni;

ü•àMetrologiya, standartlashtirish va mahsulot sifati menejmenti ta’lim yo‘nalishi 1-bosqich talabasi Xolboyeva Gulzoda Ikrom qizi 2- o‘rinni;

ü•â Sanoat korxonalarining innovatsion loyihalarini boshqarish ta’lim yo‘nalishi 3-bosqich talabasi Malikova Aziza Abduraxim qizi 3-o‘rinni egalladi. 

Musobaqada ishtirok etib,  g‘olib bo‘lgan talabalarimizni tabriklaymiz.

SBUMIPTK.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook

fields.description_en:
For the academic year 2022/2023, the Belarus-Uzbekistan Institute of Intersectoral Practical Technical Qualifications in the city of Tashkent, Faculty of "Engineering Systems", 3rd stage student of "Management of innovative projects of industrial enterprises", institute Youth the leader of the primary organization of the union Bafoyev Mirzo Ulugbek O'tkir son was awarded the state scholarship named after Islam Karimov.

Today, on February 2, 2023, the son of Bafoyev Mirzo Ulugbek O'tkir was solemnly presented with the CERTIFICATE of the Islam Karimov state scholarship established for students of the Republic of Uzbekistan. The management of the institute, professors and students took part in the event.

On behalf of the institute team, we congratulate Mirzo Ulugbek Bafoyev once again on this success. We wish you great success in your studies and work.

SBUMIPTK.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook

Bugun 2023 yil 2-fevral kuni Bafoyev Mirzo Ulug ªbek O ªtkir o ªgliga O'zbekiston Respublikasi talabalari uchun ta'sis etilgan Islom Karimov nomli davlat stipendiyasining GUVOHNOMASI tantanali ravishda topshirildi. Tadbirda institut rahbariyati,  professor-o'qituvchilar va talabalar ishtirok etishdi.

Institut jamoasi nomidan Mirzo Ulug ªbek  Bafoyevni mazkur muvoffaqiyat bilan yana bir bor  tabriklaymiz. O'qish va ishlariga ulkan zafarlar tilaymiz.

fields.description_en:

In these competitions, the honor of the Belarus-Uzbekistan Joint Interdisciplinary Practical Technical Qualification Institute in the city of Tashkent in the chess type of sport:

‚úÖ Son of Umarov Azizbek Fakhriddi, a 3rd-level student of "Management of innovative projects of industrial enterprises" and 1st-level student of "Metrology, standardization and product quality management" Kholboyeva Gulzoda Ikram. ;

‚úÖ According to the checkers type of sport: "Management of innovative projects of industrial enterprises" education direction, 3rd stage student Bozorob Sukhrob Sherzod son and "Heat-gas supply and ventilation of buildings and structures" education 1st stage student Abdumajidova Iroda Jakhongir girl is defending.

üóì On February 3, the drafts competitions ended. Today, on February 4, chess competitions will be held.

We wish our students great success in these competitions.

Our team is led by physical education teacher L. Latibova

fields.title_en: February 9 - the day of Birth of Alisher Navoi, Sultan of the estate of poetry
fields.title_uz: 9 fevral - she‚Äôriyat mulkining sultoni Alisher Navoiy tavallud topgan kun
fields.description_en:
On February 9, 2023, at the Belarus-Uzbekistan Institute of Interdisciplinary Practical Technical Qualifications in Tashkent, we will celebrate the 582nd anniversary of the birth of Alisher Navoi, the Sultan of Ghazal, our great grandfather, and promote the rich spiritual heritage left by our grandfather to students. In order to do this, a literary and artistic event was organized under the theme "Sultan of Word Property". Students of the institute, professors and teachers, management of the institute took part in this spiritual and educational event.

The event was opened by Nasriddin Mirzoodilovich Jabbarov, the executive director of the Belarus-Uzbekistan joint interdisciplinary practical technical qualification institute in Tashkent, with his thoughts on the respect shown to Navoi's work and the fact that his immortal works are studied with great interest even today. Understanding Navoi first of all, it starts with memorizing his ghazals, so Hazrat Navoi's enlightened views, his artistic world, which has been contributing to the elevation of human thinking, has not lost its value. Samples of Alisher Navoi's ghazals were heard at the spiritual and educational event.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook
fields.description_uz:
2023 yil 9 fevral kuni Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar institutida g‘azal mulkining sultoni, buyuk bobokalonimiz Alisher Navoiy tavalludining qutlug‘ 582 yilligini keng nishonlash, bobomiz qoldirgan boy ma’naviy merosni talabalarga keng targ‘ib qilish maqsadida, “So‘z mulkining sultoni” mavzucida adabiy-badiiy tadbir tashkil etildi. Mazkur ma’naviy-ma’rifiy tadbirda institut talabalari, professor-o‘qituvchilar, institut rahbariyati ishtirok etishdi.

Tadbirni Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar instituti ijrochi direktori Nasriddin Mirzoodilovich Jabborov Navoiy ijodiga ko‘rsatilayotgan ehtirom, o‘chmas boqiy asarlari bugungi kunda ham katta qiziqish bilan o‘rganilayotgani xususidagi fikrlari bilan boshlab berdi.Navoiyni anglash birinchi navbatda uning g‘azallarini yodlashdan boshlanadi, shu bois hazrat Navoiyning ma’rifiy qarashlari, inson tafakkurini yuksaltirishga hissa qo‘shib kelayotgan badiiy olami hamon o‘z qadr-qimmatini yo‘qotgani yo‘q. Ma’naviy-ma’rifiy tadbirda Alisher Navoiy g‘azallaridan namunalar tinglandi.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook

fields.title_en: February 11 "International Day of Women and Girls in Science"
fields.title_uz: 11 fevral  "Ilm-fan sohasidagi ayollar va qizlar xalqaro kuni"
fields.description_en:
At the 70th session of the United Nations General Assembly on December 22, 2015, February 11 was officially announced as the International Day of Women and Girls in Science, and since 2016, this date has been widely celebrated in many countries of the world. on February 11, 2023, at the Belarus-Uzbekistan Institute of Intersectoral Practical Technical Qualifications in Tashkent, on the occasion of February 11 - "International Day of Women and Girls in the Field of Science", women scientists and female researchers conducting scientific research a scientific-practical and spiritual-educational forum was organized with the participation of students of the institute, professors and teachers, girls of the graduating class of the 25th general secondary school in Qibray district, "Navroz" in the district. , advisers on women's issues to the chairmen of "Babur" neighborhoods, youth leaders in the neighborhoods Pakhrutdinova Malikakhan Mubashirkhanovna, Akhmedova Nilufar Mamurjonovna, female research students engaged in science participated. Doctor of technical sciences, professor Anarova Shakhzoda Amanbayevna, doctor of technical sciences, professor Nazirova Elmira Shodmonovna, doctor of technical sciences, professor Mukhamediyeva Dildora Kabilovna, candidate of technical sciences, associate professor Artikova Muazzam Akhmedovna, candidate of technical sciences, associate professor Abidova Shakhnoza Bakhodirovna, doctor of philosophy, professor, poetess, writer Mansurova Gulnora Hadjibekovna, dean of the Faculty of History of Tashkent State Pedagogical University named after Nizomi, doctor of historical sciences, professor Babakhodjayeva Lola Maratovnalar were invited.

The executive director of the institute, Jabbarov Nasriddin Mirzoodilovich, congratulated all women scientists and research women on the holiday and wished all our women and girls great success in their scientific activities.

N.M. Jabborov protects the rights and legal interests of women in our country, increases their economic, social and political activity, preserves their health, provides vocational training and employment, widely involves women in entrepreneurship, and provides social support to needy women. It was also detailed about the reforms being carried out and the progress being made in terms of support, ensuring gender equality.

Today, 31,099 scientific workers are engaged in scientific research and experimental construction activities in our country, 39.6% of them are women. Currently, the number of women who have a doctor of philosophy (PhD) degree is 2,861, and there are 707 female scientists who have obtained a doctor of science (DSc) degree.

During the event, Sayyora Mirsadikovna, the first deputy director of our institute for youth issues, spiritual and educational affairs, spoke on the topic "Women scientists are a mirror of society", doctor of physics and mathematics on the topic "The role of women in the development of science". professor Sadullayeva Shakhlo Azimbayevna gave a lecture. Doctor of technical sciences, professor Mukhammadiyeva Dildora Kabilovna gave a lecture on the topic "Scientific, enlightened women are educators of the nation's future". Also, during the event, a video on the topic "Women scientists and science", lectures by guests and talented female students were heard. An exhibition of works of female scientists and their books was held at the event. Forum guests and active participants were duly awarded.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook
fields.description_uz:
Birlashgan Millatlar Tashkiloti Bosh Assambleyasining 2015 yil 22 dekabrdagi 70-sessiyasida 11 fevral "Ilm-fan sohasidagi ayollar va qizlar xalqaro kuni" sifatida rasman e’lon qilingan bo‘lib, 2016 yildan boshlab mazkur sana dunyoning ko‘plab davlatlarida keng nishonlanib kelinmoqda.Shu munosabat bilan, 2023 yil 11 fevral kuni Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar institutida 11 fevral - "Ilm-fan sohasidagi ayollar va qizlar xalqaro kuni" munosabati bilan olima ayollar va ilmiy izlanishlar olib borayotgan tadqiqodchi xotin-qizlar ishtirokida ilmiy-amaliy va ma’naviy-ma’rifiy forum tashkil etildi.Mazkur tadbirda institutning talaba qizlari, professor-o‘qituvchilari, Qibray tumanidagi 25-umumumiy o‘rta ta’lim maktabining bitiruvchi sinf qizlari, tumandagi “Navro‘z”, “Bobur” mahallalari raislarining xotin-qizlar masalalari bo‘yicha maslahatchilari, mahalallalardagi yoshlar yetakchilari Paxrutdinova Malikaxon Mubashirxonovna, Axmedova Nilufar Mamurjonovna, ilm-fan bilan mashg‘ul bo‘lgan tadqiqodchi talaba qizlar ishtirok etishdi. Tadbirga texnika fanlari doktori, professor Anarova Shaxzoda Amanbayevna, texnika fanlari doktori, professor Nazirova Elmira Shodmonovna, texnika fanlari doktori, professor Muxamediyeva Dildora Kabilovna, texnika fanlari nomzodi, dotsent Artikova Muazzam Axmedovna, texnika fanlari nomzodi, dotsent Abidova Shaxnoza Baxodirovna, falsafa fanlari doktori, professor, shoira, yozuvchi Mansurova Gulnora Xadjibekovna, Nizomiy nomidagi Toshkent davlat pedagogika universiteti tarix fakulteti dekani, tarix fanlar doktori, professor Babaxodjayeva Lola Maratovnalar taklif etildi.

Institut ijrochi direktori Jabborov Nasriddin Mirzoodilovich barcha olima ayollar, ilmiy izlanishlar olib borayotgan tadqiqotchi xotin-qizlarni bayram bilan tabriklab, barcha ayol va qizlarmizga ilm-fan yo‘lidagi faoliyatlariga ulkan zafarlar tiladi.

N.M.Jabborov mamlakatimizda xotin-qizlarning huquq va qonuniy manfaatlarini himoya qilish, ularning iqtisodiy, ijtimoiy va siyosiy faolligini oshirish, sog‘lig‘ini saqlash, kasbga o‘qitish va bandligini ta’minlash, tadbirkorlikka keng jalb etish, ehtiyojmand xotin-qizlarni ijtimoiy qo‘llab-quvvatlash, gender tenglikni ta’minlash borasida olib borilayotgan islohotlar va erishilayotgan yutuqlar haqida ham batafsil to‘xtalib o‘tdi.

Bugungi kunda mamalakatimizda 31099 nafar ilmiy xodimlar ilmiy-tadqiqot va tajriba konstruktorlik faoliyati bilan shug‘ullanayotgan bo‘lsa, ularning 39,6 foizini ayollar tashkil etadi. Hozirgi kunda falsafa doktori (PhD) ilmiy darajasiga ega bo‘lgan xotin-qizlar soni 2861 nafarni tashkil etadi, 707 nafar fan doktori (DSc) ilmiy darajasiga erishgan olima ayollarimiz mavjud.

Tadbir davomida “Olima ayollar jamiyat ko‘zgusi” mavzusida institutimiz Yoshlar masalalari, ma’naviy-ma’rifiy ishlar bo‘yicha direktorning birinchi o‘rinbosari Saidjalalova Sayyora Mirsadikovna, “Ilm –fan taraqqiyotida ayollarning roli” mavzusida fizika-matematika fanlari doktori, professor Sadullayeva Shaxlo Azimbayevna ma’ruza qildilar. “Ilmli, ma’rifatli ayollar millat kelajagining tarbiyachisi” mavzusida texnika fanlari doktori, professor Muxammadiyeva Dildora Kabilovna ma’ruza qildi. Shuningdek, tadbir davomida “Olima ayollar va ilm-fan” mavzusida videolavha, mehmonlar va iqtidorli talaba qizlar ma’ruzalari tinglandi. Tadbirda olima ayollar ijodi namunalari, ularning kitoblari ko‘rgazmasi bo‘lib o‘tdi. Forum mehmonlari va faol ishtirokchilar munosib taqdirlandilar.

fields.description_en:
Implementation of Clause 31 of the Program for the Implementation of the State Policy on Youth in the Republic of Uzbekistan in 2022-2023, approved by the Annex to Decision No. 310 of the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Uzbekistan dated June 7, 2022, and No. 387 of the Ministry of Higher and Secondary Special Education dated November 25, 2022 "Higher Educational Institutions" in order to ensure the implementation of the order "On holding the Student Theater Studios" competition among young students, on February 11, 2023, the regional stage of the "Student Theater Studios" republican competition was held at the Chirchik State Pedagogical University. Teams of theater studios consisting of talented students of higher educational institutions located in Tashkent region took part in this competition.

fields.title_en: The first Belarusian-Uzbek SOP in the field of additional adult education
fields.title_uz: Kattalar uchun qo'shimcha ta'lim sohasida birinchi Belarus-O'zbek SOP
fields.description_en:
In order to implement the task defined by the Joint Belarusian-Uzbek Intersectoral Institute of Applied Technical Qualifications in Tashkent (SBUMIPTK) by a decree of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan - advanced training of specialists and scientific and pedagogical personnel due to the continuity and continuity of education and science, on the board of the institute, held in Tashkent, under the leadership of director I.I. Gancherenok in the spring of 2022, it was decided to organize joint educational programs in the field of additional education for adults. The opening of the first Belarusian-Uzbek joint educational program for advanced training between SBUMIPTK and the branch of BNTU "Institute for Advanced Studies and Retraining of Personnel in New Directions in the Development of Engineering, Technology and Economics" (IPKiPK) took place on February 9, 2023. Director I. I. Gancherenok, executive director N. M. Zhabborov and head of the department of IPKiPK S. S. Karpovich took part in the opening of the courses "Innovative educational technologies and methods" for 31 students - representatives of the teaching staff of SBUMIPTK. Completion of the curriculum of advanced training courses of 144 hours with the presentation of state certificates of advanced training of the Republic of Belarus will be held in full-time mode in Tashkent. It is planned to develop such an innovative form of additional adult education with other higher educational institutions of Uzbekistan.

fields.description_uz:
O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidentining qarori bilan Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik malaka instituti (SBUMIPTK) tomonidan belgilangan vazifani amalga oshirish maqsadida – uzluksizligi va uzluksizligi tufayli mutaxassislar va ilmiy-pedagogik kadrlarning malakasini oshirish. ta ºlim va fan uzluksizligi bo ªyicha institut direktori I.I.Gancherenok boshchiligida Toshkent shahrida bo ªlib o ªtgan kengash kengashida 2022-yil bahorida kattalar uchun qo ªshimcha ta ºlim sohasida qo ªshma ta ºlim dasturlarini tashkil etish to ªg ªrisida qaror qabul qilindi. Fevral kuni SUMIPTK va BNTU “Muhandislik, texnologiya va iqtisodiyotni rivojlantirishning yangi yo‘nalishlari bo‘yicha kadrlar malakasini oshirish va qayta tayyorlash instituti” (IPKiPK) o‘rtasida malaka oshirish bo‘yicha birinchi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma ta’lim dasturining ochilishi bo‘lib o‘tdi. 9, 2023 yil. Direktor I. I. Gancherenok, ijrochi direktor N. M. Jabborov va IPKiPK bo‘lim boshlig‘i S. S. Karpovichlar 31 nafar talaba – SUMIPTK professor-o‘qituvchilari vakillari uchun “Innovatsion ta’lim texnologiyalari va usullari” kurslarining ochilishida ishtirok etdilar. 144 soatlik malaka oshirish kurslari o‘quv dasturini Belarus Respublikasi malaka oshirish davlat sertifikatlarini taqdim etish bilan yakunlash Toshkent shahrida kunduzgi rejimda o‘tkaziladi. O‘zbekistonning boshqa oliy ta’lim muassasalari bilan birgalikda kattalar uchun qo‘shimcha ta’limning bunday innovatsion shaklini rivojlantirish rejalashtirilgan.

fields.description_en:
Education of the youth, who make up the main part of the population of our country, their quality education and growing up as a healthy and mature generation are the main criteria of the state policy. Therefore, communicating with young people, conveying the essence of the implemented reforms to students, bringing out their talents and potentials, getting closer to young people, getting into them, studying their problems and helping them directly is a matter of every higher education. is one of the most important tasks facing the institution.

On February 17, 2023, a "Leader and Youth" meeting was held at the Belarusian-Uzbekistan Institute of Intersectoral Practical Technical Qualifications in Tashkent with the participation of Executive Director Professor Nasriddin Mirzoodilovich Jabbarov and students of the 1st stage of the institute. Faculty deans, relevant officials and tutors participated in this meeting.

At this meeting, which was held in the form of open dialogue, the students directly addressed the leaders with their questions, existing problems, and suggestions.
fields.description_uz:
Yurtimiz aholisining asosiy qismini tashkil etuvchi yoshlar tarbiyasi, ularning sifatli ta ºlim olishlari hamda sog ºlom va barkamol avlod bo ºlib voyaga yetishlari davlat siyosatining bosh mezonlaridan hisoblanadi. Shuning uchun ham yoshlar bilan muloqot olib borish, amalga oshirilayotgan islohotlarning mazmun mohiyatini talaba-yoshlarga yetkazish, ularning o ºz iqtidor va salohiyatlarini yuzaga chiqarishi, yoshlar bilan yanada yaqin bo ºlish, ular ichiga kirib borish, ularning muammolarini o ºrganish va ularga bevosita ko ºmaklashish masalasi har bir oliy ta ºlim muassasasining oldida turgan eng ustuvor vazifalardan biridir. 

2023 yil 17 fevral—å kuni Toshkent shahridagi Belarus—å-O ºzbekiston qo ºshma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar institutida ijroch direktor professor Nasriddin Mirzoodilovich Jabborov va institutning 1-bosqich talabalari ishtirokida “Rahbar va yoshlar” uchrashuvi bo ºlib o ºtdi. Mazkur uchrashuvda fakul—åtet dekanlari, tegishli mas ºullar va t—åyutorlar ishtirok etdi.

Ochiq muloqot tarzda o ºtkazilgan mazkur uchrashuvda talaba-yoshlar o ºzlarini qiziqtirgan savollar, mavjud muammolar, va takliflari bilan rahbarlarga bevosita murojaat etdilar.

On February 17, 2023, the faculty of SBUMIPTK took part, at the invitation of the director of the institute I.I. Goncharenko, in the X Open International Scientific and Practical Conference "Roadmap for the Digital Transformation of Education"
organized by the State Educational Institution "Minsk City Institute for the Development of Education", the main participants in the discussion were employees of the Main Information and Analytical Center of the Ministry
education of the Republic of Belarus. RGOO "Belarusian society" Knowledge ". 
Irina Chernyavskaya delivered a welcoming speech to the conference participants
Alexandrovna, Deputy Chairman of the Education Committee
Minsk City Executive Committee.
The report of Khareaich Irina Leonidovna, Head of the Department of Information Educational Technologies, aroused sufficient interest. It should be noted the active participation in the discussions of R.G. Mullakhmetov and F.R. Yuzlikaev, who outlined the priority areas emerging in the digital transformation of the modern educational space.

fields.description_en:
Day of Belarusian science and education at TDTU

On February 15, 2023, a planned event devoted to the Day of Belarusian Science and Education was held at the Belarusian Culture and Education Center at the Tashkent State Technical University (TDTU) named after Islam Karimov. Moderator was TDTU vice-rector U. V. Mannanov. Counselor-ambassador of the Embassy of the Republic of Belarus in the Republic of Uzbekistan A. N. Onimakh welcomed the participants. I.I. Gancherenok, Director of the Belarus-Uzbekistan Interdisciplinary Institute of Applied Technical Qualifications (BUMIPTK), said in a report dedicated to the 30th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between our countries and a corresponding detailed presentation prepared in cooperation with the scientific library of BNTU. academic component in the development of interstate academic cooperation, dynamics and prospects of mutual cooperation between friendly countries. TDTU vice-rector S.B. Donaev devoted his speech to the prospects of scientific cooperation between TDTU and BNTU. S. M. Saijalalova, the first deputy director of BUMIPTK in Tashkent, and S. M. Gribkova, the deputy director of the Institute of Integrated Forms of Education and Educational Monitoring of BNTU spoke.

For information: the Belarusian Culture and Education Center at TDTU was opened in May 2022. In December of the same year, the Center of Uzbek Culture and Education was opened under BNTU. The centers are designed to internationalize higher education, to provide a unique cultural-educational synergy of forming citizenship and patriotic competencies in students.

fields.description_uz:
TDTUda Belarus fan va ta'lim kuni

2023-yil 15-fevral kuni Islom Karimov nomidagi Toshkent davlat texnika universiteti (TDTU) qoshidagi Belarus madaniyati va ta’lim markazida Belarus fan va ta’lim kuniga bag‘ishlangan rejalashtirilgan tadbir bo‘lib o‘tdi. Moderator TDTU prorektori U. V. Mannanov bo‘ldi. Belarus Respublikasining O‘zbekiston Respublikasidagi elchixonasi maslahatchisi-elchisi A. N. Onimax ishtirokchilarni qutladi. Mamlakatlarimiz o‘rtasida diplomatik munosabatlar o‘rnatilganining 30 yilligiga bag‘ishlangan ma’ruzasi va BNTU ilmiy kutubxonasi bilan hamkorlikda tayyorlangan tegishli batafsil taqdimotda Belarus-O‘zbekiston tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik malaka instituti (BUMIPTK) direktori I.I.Gancherenok ta’kidladi. davlatlararo akademik hamkorlikni rivojlantirishdagi akademik komponent, do ªst davlatlar o ªrtasidagi o ªzaro hamkorlik dinamikasi va istiqbollari. TDTU prorektori S.B.Donaev o‘z nutqini TDTU va BNTU o‘rtasidagi ilmiy hamkorlik istiqbollariga bag‘ishladi. Ta’lim-tarbiya masalalari bo‘yicha Toshkent shahridagi BUMIPTK qo‘shma direktorining birinchi o‘rinbosari S. M. Saijalalova, BNTU Ta’limning yaxlit shakllari va ta’lim monitoringi instituti direktori o‘rinbosari S. M. Gribkovalar so‘zga chiqdilar.

Ma’lumot uchun: TDTU qoshidagi Belarus madaniyati va ta’limi markazi 2022-yil may oyida ochilgan. O ªsha yilning dekabr oyida BNTU qoshida O ªzbek madaniyati va ta ºlimi markazi ochildi. Sentlar oliy ta'limni xalqarolashtirish, talabalarda fuqarolik va vatanparvarlik kompetensiyalarini shakllantirishning noyob madaniy-ma'rifiy sinergiyasini ta'minlash uchun mo'ljallangan.

fields.title_en: A spiritual and educational event was held in the framework of the rapid preventive action "Fighting the spread of drugs among young people" at the Belarus-Uzbekistan Joint Intersectoral Practical Technical Qualification Institute in Tashkent.
fields.title_uz: Toshkent shahridagi Belarus—å-O ºzbekiston qo ºshma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar institutida ‚ÄúYoshlar orasida giyohvandlik vositalarining tarqalishiga qarshi kurash‚Äù tezkor profilaktik tadbir doirasida ma ºnaviy-ma ºrifiy tadbir o ºtkazildi
fields.description_en:
A spiritual and educational event was held in the framework of the rapid preventive action "Fighting the spread of drugs among young people" at the Belarus-Uzbekistan joint intersectoral practical technical qualification institute in Tashkent.

Working with young people in Uzbekistan, protecting their interests and supporting them in every way, raising their political and legal consciousness, culture, thinking and worldview, and most importantly instilling a sense of loyalty to the Motherland in their minds and hearts is an urgent issue today.

According to the letter No. 04-88 dated February 2, 2023 of the State Commission on Narcotics Control of the Republic of Uzbekistan, the task of conducting rapid preventive measures "Combating the spread of narcotic drugs among young people" during the month of February of this year has been established.

In this regard, on February 22, 2023, at the Belarus-Uzbekistan Joint Intersectoral Practical Technical Qualification Institute in Tashkent, in cooperation with the IIB of Qibray district, within the framework of the rapid preventive event "Fight against the spread of drugs among young people", a spiritual and educational meeting was held with students. an event, a roundtable discussion was held.

At this event, the management of the institute, teachers, students, Department of Internal Affairs of Qibray district, public security service, crime prevention department, psychologists for the prevention of crime among minors and young people, senior inspector lieutenant colonel D. Umarov, inspectors captain U. Tugashev and senior lieutenant F. Yoldashev took part.

The executive director of the institute, N.M. Jabborov, made a speech and said that the fight against drug addiction, which is considered one of the most dangerous crimes and recognized as the "plague of the century" among the youth, prevention of crimes, protecting them from negative effects, especially preventing the coming young generation from falling into the trap of this disease is considered to be one of the urgent issues facing us, unfortunately, nowadays there are cases of consumption of drugs containing narcotic drugs among young people, and the mental and physical health of our young people. underlining that it is a pity that despite the fact that our state has created all conditions for them to grow up, acquire modern knowledge and profession, they commit crimes related to narcotics and enter the path of drug addiction. tdi

Lieutenant-Colonel D. Umarov, Senior Inspector of Kibray District Internal Affairs Department, Public Security Service, Crime Prevention Department, Juvenile and Youth Crime Prevention, spoke and said that on August 19, 1999 in our Republic, "Narcotic drugs and psychotropic substances of course, that many events and preventive meetings are being carried out in order to prevent the spread of this disease among young people, and to prevent crimes that may occur as a result of drug addiction. emphasized the expediency of many such events and educational activities about the harmful effects of drug addiction.

During the event, the theater group "Stars of Hope" of the Belarus-Uzbekistan Joint Institute of Applied Technical Qualifications in Tashkent presented the play "Open Your Eyes". The students were greatly impressed by the performance, which reflected the sad consequences of drug addiction.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook
fields.description_uz:
Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar institutida “Yoshlar orasida giyohvandlik vositalarining tarqalishiga qarshi kurash” tezkor profilaktik tadbir doirasida ma’naviy-ma’rifiy tadbir o‘tkazildi

O‘zbekistonda yoshlar bilan ishlash, ularning manfaatini himoya qilish va har tomonlama qo‘llab-quvvatlash, ularning siyosiy, huquqiy ongi, madaniyatini, tafakkuri va dunyoqarashini yuksaltirish, eng asosiysi ularning ongi va qalbiga Vataniga sadoqat tuyg‘usini singdirish bugungi kundagi dolzarb masaladir.

O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Narkotik moddalar ustidan nazorat qilish bo‘yicha Davlat komissiyasining 2023 yil 2 fevraldagi ‚Ññ04-88-sonli xatiga asosan joriy yilning fevral oyi davomida “Yoshlar orasida giyohvandlik vositalarining tarqalishiga qarshi kurash” tezkor profilaktik tadbirlarini o‘tkazish vazifasi belgilangan.

Shu munosabat bilan 2023 yil 22 fevral kuni Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar institutida Qibray tumani IIB bilan hamkorlikda “Yoshlar orasida giyohvandlik vositalarining tarqalishiga qarshi kurash” tezkor profilaktik tadbir doirasida talabalar bilan ma’naviy-ma’rifiy tadbir, davra suhbati o‘tkazildi.

Mazkur tadbirda institut rahbariyati, professor-o‘qituvchilar, talabalar Qibray tumani ichki ishlar bo‘limi, jamoat xavfsizligi xizmati, huquqbuzarliklar profilaktikasi bo‘limi, voyaga yetmaganlar va yoshlar o‘rtasida jinoyatchilikni oldini olish psixologlari katta inspektor podpolkovnik D.Umarov, inspektorlar kapitan U.Tugashev va katta leytenant F.Yo‘ldoshevlar ishtirok etishdi.

 Institut ijrochi direktori N.M.Jabborov so‘zga chiqib, Yoshlar o‘rtasida nazoratsizlik, huquqbuzarliklarni oldini olish, ularni salbiy ta’sirlardan saqlash, eng xavfli jinoyatlardan biri hisoblangan, insoniyat tomonidan “Asr vabosi” deb tan olingan giyohvandlik illatiga qarshi kurash, ayniqsa o‘sib kelayotgan yosh avlodni bu illat domiga tushib qolishlarini oldini olish oldimizda turgan dolzarb masalalardan hisoblanishi, afsuski, hozirgi kunda yoshlar orasida tarkibida giyohvandlik vositalari bo‘lgan dori vositalarini iste’mol qilish holatlarining uchrab turishi hamda, yoshlarimizning ruxan va jismonan sog‘lom, barkamol bo‘lib voyaga yetishishlari, zamonaviy bilim va kasbga ega bo‘lishlari uchun davlatiimiz tomonidan barcha shart-sharoitlar yaratilib berilgan bo‘lishiga qaramay narkotik moddalar bilan bog‘liq jinoyatlarni sodir qilishlari va giyohvandlik yo‘liga kirib ketayotganligi achinarli holat ekanligini ta’kidlab o‘tdi.

 Qibray tumani ichki ishlar bo‘limi, jamoat xavfsizligi xizmati, huquqbuzarliklar profilaktikasi bo‘limi, voyaga yetmaganlar va yoshlar o‘rtasida jinoyatchilikni oldini olish katta inspektor podpolkovnik D.Umarov so‘zga chiqib, Respublikamizda 1999 yil 19 avgustda «Giyohvandlik vositalari va psixotrop moddalari to‘g‘risida»gi Qonuni qabul qilingani, yoshlar o‘rtasida ushbu illatning tarqalishiga yo‘l qo‘ymaslik, giyohvandlik oqibatida sodir bo‘lishi mumkin bo‘lgan jinoyatlarning oldini olish maqsadida ko‘plab tadbirlar, profilaktik uchrashuvlar amalga oshirilayotganligi, albatta mana shunday tadbirlar, giyohvandlikning zararli oqibatlari haqidagi tushuntirish-targ‘ibot ishlarining ko‘plab o‘tkazilishi maqsadga muvofiqligini ta’kidlab o‘tdi.

Tadbir davomida Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar institutining “Umid yulduzlari” teatr jamoasi tomonidani “Ko‘zingni och” nomli spektakl namoyish etildi. Giyoxvandlikning ayanchli oqibatlarini aks ettirgan spektakl ko‘rinishi talabalarda katta taassurot qoldirdi.

fields.title_en: Sports competitions were held between male and female students of higher educational institutions
fields.title_uz: Oliy ta‚Äôlim muassasalari talaba-qizlari o‚Äòrtasida sport musobaqalari o‚Äòtkazildi
fields.description_en:
Sports competitions were held between male and female students of higher educational institutions

PF-27 of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan dated February 28, 2022 on the state program for the implementation of the development strategy of New Uzbekistan for 2022-2026 in the "year of attention to people and quality education" ”, the Decree of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan dated October 30, 2020 No. PF-6099 “On measures for the wide implementation of a healthy lifestyle and further development of mass sports”, previously issued by the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan The 2nd initiative of the 5 important initiatives launched, that is, physical training of young people, creating the necessary conditions for them to show their abilities in the field of sports, and on the occasion of March 8 - International Women's Day, a joint Belarus-Uzbekistan intersectoral practical technical workshop in Tashkent On March 6, 2023, at the initiative of the Institute of Qualifications, a sports competition between male and female students will be held at the sports complex of Tashkent State Technical University named after Islam Karimov. were established.

Meaningful organization of free time of students, widespread implementation of healthy lifestyle among girls and further development of public sports, creating conditions for students to engage in physical education and mass sports, promoting healthy lifestyle of students The main goal of the event is to increase the level of support and physical activity, to further develop cooperation in the field of sports between higher education institutions, and to properly celebrate the International Women's Day on March 8.

This sports festival has become a tradition since the 2020-2021 academic year, and at this year's 3rd sports festival, the Belarus-Uzbekistan Institute of Intersectoral Practical Technical Qualifications in Tashkent, Samarkand State Veterinary Medicine, Animal Husbandry and the Tashkent branch of the University of Biotechnology, Tashkent State Technical University, Tashkent branch of the federal state budget higher educational institution "Moscow Energy Institute (MEI)" national research university, and "STARS INTERNATIONAL" University took part. Sports competitions were chess, checkers, relay, tug-of-war and table tennis were held.

The team of the Tashkent State Technical University won the first place, the team of the Belarus-Uzbekistan Joint Interdisciplinary Technical Qualification Institute in Tashkent took the second place, and the team of the Tashkent branch of the Samarkand State Veterinary Medicine, Animal Husbandry and Biotechnology University took the 3rd place. The winners and prize-winners were awarded with souvenirs and certificates of honor of the Belarus-Uzbekistan Joint Interdisciplinary Practical Technical Qualifications Institute in Tashkent.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook
fields.description_uz:
Oliy ta’lim muassasalari talaba-qizlari o‘rtasida sport musobaqalari o‘tkazildi

O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidentining 2022 yil 28 fevraldagi PF-27-son 2022-2026 yillarga mo‘ljallangan Yangi O‘zbekistonning taraqqiyot strategiyasini “Insonga e’tibor va sifatli ta’lim yili”da amalga oshirishga oid davlat dasturi to‘g‘risida”gi, O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidentining 2020 yil 30 oktabrdagi PF-6099-son “Sog‘lom turmush tarzini keng tatbiq etish va ommaviy sportni yanada rivojlantirish chora-tadbirlari to‘g‘risida”gi Farmonlari, O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti tomonidan ilgari surilgan 5 ta muhim tashabbusning 2-tashabbusi, ya’ni yoshlarni jismoniy chiniqtirish, ularning sport sohasida qobiliyatini namoyon qilishlari uchun zarur sharoitlar yaratish hamda 8 mart -Xalqaro xotin qizlar kuni munosabati bilan, Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar instituti tashabbusi bilan 2023 yil 6 mart kuni Islom Karimov nomidagi Toshkent davlat texnika universitetining sport kompleksida talaba-qizlar o‘rtasida sport musobaqalari tashkil etildi.

Talabalarning bo‘sh vaqtini mazmunli tashkil etish, qizlar o‘rtasida sog‘lom turmush tarzini hayotga keng tatbiq etish va ommaviy sportni yanada rivojlantirish, talabalarni jismoniy tarbiya va ommaviy sport bilan shug‘ullanishga shart-sharoitlar yaratish, talabalarning sog‘lom turmush tarzini qo‘llab-quvvatlash va jismoniy faolligi darajasini oshirish, Oliy ta’lim muassasalari o‘rtasidagi sport sohasidagi hamkorlikni yanada rivojlantirish hamda 8 mart-Xalqaro xotin qizlar bayramini munosib nishonlash tadbirning asosiy maqsad hisoblanadi. 

Mazkur sport festivali 2020-2021 o‘quv yilidan boshlab o‘tkazish an’anaga aylangan bo‘lib, bu yilgi 3-sport festivalida Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar instituti, Samarqand davlat veterinariya meditsinasi, chorvachilik va biotexnologiyalar universiteti Toshkent filiali, Toshkent davlat texnika universiteti, “Moskva energetika instituti (MEI)” milliy tadqiqot universiteti" federal davlat budjeti oliy ta’lim muassasasining Toshkent filiali hamda “STARS INTERNATIONAL” universiteti talaba qizlari ishtirok etishdi. Sport musobaqalari shaxmat, shashka, estafeta, arqon tortish va stol tennisi yo‘nalishlarida o‘tkazildi.

Umumjamoa hisobida  Toshkent davlat texnika universiteti jamoasi birinchi,  Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar instituti jamoasi ikkinchi, Samarqand davlat veterinariya meditsinasi, chorvachilik va biotexnologiyalar unversiteti Toshkent filiali jamoasi 3-o‘rinni qo‘lga kiritishdi.  G‘olib va sovrindorlar Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar institutining esdalik sovg‘alari va faxriy yorliqlari bilan taqdirlandi.

At this spiritual and educational event, holiday greetings will be performed by the talented students of our institute, their creative performances, and of course, a concert program will be held with the participation of the stars of Uzbek pop music.

Hurmatli ustozlar va aziz talabalar !!!

8-mart -Xalqaro xotin-qizlar kuni munosabati bilan 2023 yil 7-mart kuni soat 13-00 da Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O'zbekiston qo'shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikasiyalar institutining faollar zalida tantanali bayram kechasi o'tkaziladi. 

Mazkur ma'naviy-ma'rifaiy tadbirda institutimizning iste'dodli talabalari ijrosida bayram tabriklari, ularning ijodiy chiqishlari va albatta o'zbek estradasining yulduzlari ishtirokida konsert dasturi bo'lib o'tadi.

fields.description_en:
March 8 - International Women's Day

On the occasion of March 8 - International Women's Day, a festive event was organized at the Belarus-Uzbekistan Joint Intersectoral Practical Technical Qualification Institute in Tashkent. Students, management of the institute, professors and teachers and parents took part in the festive event. The executive director of the institute, N.M. Jabborov, made a speech and sincerely congratulated the women working in the institute with a spring holiday.

As noted, a woman has always been a symbol of kindness and loyalty. When we think of a woman, first of all, we have the image of a great and blessed mother. There is a human race that learns all the goodness and goodness in the world, the secrets and lessons of life thanks to the love and generosity of the mother. There is a woman whose world is bright, there is a woman whose life is beautiful and charming.

Talented students of the institute presented an artistic program as a holiday gift and shared a good mood with everyone. Each of their performances received applause. Pop singers invited the participants of the holiday to the circle with popular songs.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook

fields.description_uz:
8-mart - Xalqaro xotin-qizlar bayrami

8-mart - Xalqaro xotin-qizlar kuni munosabati bilan Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar institutida tantanali bayram tadbiri tashkil etildi. Bayram tadbirida talabalar, institut rahbariyati, professor-o‘qituvchilar va ota-onalar ishtirok etishdi. Unda institut ijrochi direktori N.M.Jabborov so'zga chiqib, institutda faoliyat olib borayotgan xotin-qizlarni bahoriy bayram bilan samimiy qutladi.

Ta ºkidlanganidek, ayol azaldan mehr-shafqat va sadoqat timsoli bo’lib kelgan. Ayol deganda ko’z o’ngimizda, avvalo, ulug’ va tabarruk ona siymosi gavdalanadi. Inson zoti borki, olamdagi barcha yaxshilik va ezguliklarni, hayot sir-u asrorlari va saboqlarini onaning mehr-u sahovati tufayli o’rganadi. Ayol borki, olam munavvar, ayol borki, hayot go’zal va maftunkor.

Institut iste'dodli talaba-yigitlari bayram tuhfasi sifatida badiiy dastur namoyish etib, barchaga ko'tarinki kayfiyat ulashdilar. Ularning har bir chiqishlari olqishlarga sazovor bo'ldi. Estrada xonandalari diltortar kuy-qo'shiqlari bilan bayram ishtirokchilarini davraga chorladilar. 

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook

The second initiative of the 5 important initiatives put forward by the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan - "In order to provide physical training to young people, to create the necessary conditions for them to show their abilities in the field of sports, and to support them, sports competitions are constantly held with the participation of the students of the institute. On March 10 of this year, mini-football with the participation of the students of the Belarusian-Uzbekistan joint interdisciplinary practical technical qualification institute in Tashkent and the students of the Tashkent branch of the Federal state budget higher educational institution "D.I. Mendeleev Russian University of Chemistry and Technology" a friendly meeting was held.

fields.description_uz:
O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti  tomonidan ilgari surilgan 5 ta muhim tashabbusning ikkinchi tashabbusi -“Yoshlarni jismoniy chiniqtirish, ularning sport sohasida qobiliyatini namoyon qilishlari uchun zarur sharoitlar yaratish hamda qo‘llab quvvatlash maqsadida, institut talabalari ishtirokida doimiy ravishda sport musobaqalari o‘tkazib kelinmoqda. Joriy yilning 10 mart kuni Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar instituti talabalari bilan "D.I.Mendeleyev nomidagi Rossiya kimyo-texnologiya universiteti" Federal davlat budjeti oliy ta’lim muassasasining Toshkent filiali talabalari ishtirokida mini-futbol bo‘yicha o‘rtoqlik uchrashuvi o‘tkazildi.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook

fields.title_en: On the eve of this spring, the Belarus-Uzbekistan joint interdisciplinary practical technical qualification institute in Tashkent
fields.title_uz: Mazkur bahor ayyomi arafasida Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‚Äòzbekiston qo‚Äòshma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar instituti
fields.description_en:
Nowruz is always considered as the season of renewal and living, as it spreads the freshness of spring to the hearts, instills hope and confidence in new and prosperous days in everyone. This holiday encourages each of us to appreciate life in peace and give thanks for the blessings.

  On the eve of this spring, students of the Belarus-Uzbekistan Institute of Intersectoral Practical Technical Qualifications, Biotechnical and Medical Devices and Systems, 2nd stage of education, under the guidance of group tutor N.Sagatova, organized a trip to the peaceful nature of Parkent district. .

The purpose of organizing the trip is to increase the environmental consciousness and culture of students and young people, to preserve mother nature and its blessings, and to meaningfully organize free time of students from classes. It is clear that the efforts of young people to protect nature and pay attention to it will be an important step for environmental protection in the future. Also, during the trip, the "Warrack launch" competition was organized.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook
fields.description_uz:
Navro‘zi olam yangilanish va yasharish fasli bahor tarovatini qalblarga ulashib, barchada yangi va farovon kunlarga umid hamda ishonch uyg‘otishi bilan hamisha qadrli sanaladi. Ushbu bayram har birimizda tinch-osuda hayotni qadrlab, ne’matlarga shukrona keltirishga undaydi.

 Mazkur bahor ayyomi arafasida Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar instituti, Biotexnik va tibbiy apparatlar va tizimlar ta’lim yo‘nalishi 2-bosqich talabalari guruh tyutori N.Sagatova rahbarligida Parkent tumanidagi so‘lim tabiatga sayoxat uyushtirishdi.

Sayyoxatni tashkil etishdan maqsad, talaba-yoshlarning ekologik ong va madaniyatini yanada yuksaltirish, ona tabiatni, uning ne’matlarini asrab-avaylash, talabalarning darslardan bo‘sh vaqtlarini mazmunli tashkil etishdir. Yoshlarning tabiatni asrash, unga e’tiborli bo‘lish borasidagi sa’y-harakatlari kelajakda atrof-muhit muhofazasi uchun muhim qadam bo‘lishi aniq. Shuningdek sayoxat davomida "Varrak uchirish" musobaqasi ham tashkil etildi.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook

fields.title: –ü–§-6165 –æ—Ç 9 —Ñ–µ–≤—Ä–∞–ª—è 2021 –≥–æ–¥–∞ –ü—Ä–µ–∑–∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ –†–µ—Å–ø—É–±–ª–∏–∫–∏ –£–∑–±–µ–∫–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω
fields.title_en: PF-6165 dated February 9, 2021 of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan
fields.title_uz: O‚Äòzbekiston Respublikasi Prezidentining 2021 yil 9 fevraldagi PF-6165-son
fields.description_en:
To ensure the implementation of the tasks specified in the decision of the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan dated February 9, 2021 No. PF-6165 "On measures to further develop domestic and pilgrimage tourism in the Republic of Uzbekistan" and in connection with the Navruz national holiday Belarus-Uzbekistan Joint Interdisciplinary Practical Technical Qualifications Institute in Tashkent plans to conduct student visits to historical monuments, places of pilgrimage and recreation areas in our country.

In this regard, on March 13, 2023, "Zangiota" located in the Zangiota district of the Tashkent region under the leadership of M. Mamtraimov, group tutor of the 1st-level students of the institute's educational directions of the field of heat and gas supply and ventilation of buildings and structures and the field of service " they visited the shrine. During the visit, the students got to know the existing historical monument and cultural-spiritual heritage in the "Zangiota" historical complex.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook
fields.description_uz:
O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidentining 2021 yil 9 fevraldagi PF-6165-son “O‘zbekiston Respublikasida ichki va ziyorat turizmini yanada rivojlantirish chora-tadbirlari to‘g‘risida” qarorida belgilangan vazifalar ijrosini ta’minlash hamda Navro‘z umumxalq bayrami munosabati bilan bahor oylarida Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar instituti tomonidan mamlakatmizdagi tarixiy obidalar, ziyoratgoxlar va dam olish maskanlari joylashgan hududlarga talabalar tashriflarini amalga oshirish rejalashtirilgan.

Shu munosabat bilan, 2023 yil 13 mart kuni institutning Bino va inshootlarning issiqlik-gaz ta’minoti va ventilyatsiyasi va Xizmat ko‘rsatish sohasi ta’lim yo‘nalishlari 1-bosqich talabalari guruh tyutori M.Mamtraimov rahbarligida Toshkent viloyati Zangiota tumanida joylashgan “Zangiota” ziyoratgohiga tashrif buyurishdi. Talabalar ziyorat mobaynida “Zangiota”  tarixiy majmuasidagi mavjud tarixiy obida va madaniy-ma’naviy meros bilan yaqindan tanishdilar.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook

fields.description_en:
The second initiative of the 5 important initiatives put forward by the President of the Republic of Uzbekistan - "Physical training of young people, creation of necessary conditions for them to show their abilities in the field of sports, support and on the occasion of Navruz national holiday on March 14-17, 2023 We have informed about the holding of sports competitions in chess, checkers, arm wrestling and table tennis at the Belarus-Uzbekistan joint branch technical qualification institute in Tashkent.

On March 14, 2023, a table tennis competition was held among students at the institute. At the end of the uncompromising and exciting debates:

The son of Rakhmonov Orzumurad Bakhtiyar, a student of the 1st stage of economic education, took the 3rd place;

1st level student of the service industry (automobiles) Torakhanov Samandar Khairulloyevich, 2nd place;

The winner of the competition was the son of Kenjayev Makhmudjon Murodjon, a student of the 2nd stage of the transport logistics education.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook
fields.description_uz:
O‘zbekiston Respublikasi Prezidenti  tomonidan ilgari surilgan 5 ta muhim tashabbusning ikkinchi tashabbusi -“Yoshlarni jismoniy chiniqtirish, ularning sport sohasida qobiliyatini namoyon qilishlari uchun zarur sharoitlar yaratish, qo‘llab quvvatlash hamda Navro‘z umumxalq bayrami munosabati bilan 2023 yil 14-17 mart kunlari Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar institutida sportning shaxmat, shashka, armrestling va stol tennisi turlari bo‘yicha musobaqalar o‘tkazilishi haqida xabar bergan edik. 

2023 yil 14 mart kuni institutda talabalar o‘rtasida stol tennisi musobaqasi o‘tkazildi. Murosasiz va hayajonga boy o‘tgan bahslar yakuniga ko‘ra:

Iqtisod ta’lim yo‘nalishi 1-bosqich talabasi Raxmonov Orzumurod Baxtiyor o‘g‘li 3-o‘rin;

Xizmat ko‘rsatish sohasi (avtomobillar) ta’lim yo‘nalishi 1-bosqich talabasi To‘raxonov Samandar Xayrulloyevich 2- o‘rin;

Transport logistikasi ta’lim yo‘nalishi 2-bosqich talabasi Kenjayev Maxmudjon Murodjon o‘g‘li musobaqa g‘olibi bo‘ldi.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook

fields.title: ¬´–£–Ω–∏–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–∞–¥–∞-2022¬ª - –ù–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –±–æ—Ä—å–±–∞
fields.description_en:
On March 14, 2023, the competitions of the Tashkent city stage of the national wrestling sport of the "Universiade-2022" sports competition were held among students of higher educational institutions. Members of the national team, consisting of students of the Belarus-Uzbekistan Joint Interdisciplinary Practical Technical Qualification Institute, under the leadership of coach Latibova Lilya Vladimirovna, took part in it.

According to the results of the competition, our team member Kholmurodov Islombek Sokhibjonovich, a student of the 1st stage of the field of study of mechanical engineering technology, machinery production equipment and their automation, took part in the competition in the weight of 90 kg and won a bronze medal.

We congratulate our student I. Kholmurodov and his coach L. V. Latibova on this success and wish great victories in the next competitions.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook
fields.description_uz:
2023 yil 14 mart kuni oliy ta’lim muassasalari talabalari o‘rtasida "Universiada-2022" sport musobaqalarining milliy kurash sport turi bo‘yicha Toshkent shahar bosqichi musobaqalari bo‘lib o‘tdi. Unda Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar instituti talabalaridan iborat terma jamoa a’zolari ham murabbiy Latibova Lilya Vladimirovna rahbarligida ishtirok etdi. 

Musobaqa yakunlariga ko‘ra, jamoamiz a’zosi Mashinasozlik texnologiyasi, mashinasozlik ishlab chiqarishlari uskunalari va ularni avtomatlashtirish ta’lim yo‘nalishi 1-bosqich talabasi Xolmurodov Islombek Soxibjonovich 90 kg vaznda musobaqada ishtirok etib,  bronza medaliga sazovor bo‘ldi.

Talabamiz I.Xolmurodov va murabbiyi L.V.Latibovani mazkur muvaffaqiyat bilan tabriklaymiz hamda keyingi musobaqalarda ulkan zafarlar tilaymiz.

Aliyarov, active students of the 3rd stage of the educational direction of the management of innovative projects of industrial enterprises of the Belarus-Uzbekistan Joint Interdisciplinary Practical Technical Qualification Institute in Tashkent under the motto "don't be left out", families in need of social protection, elderly and intellectuals living in "Navroz" neighborhood, Qibray district, Tashkent region, visited their homes and shared joy in their hearts in order to find out about the condition of needy and disabled persons. .

fields.title_en: "Uzbekistan-Belarus: 30 years in the traditions of friendship, trust and cooperation"
fields.title_uz: ‚ÄúO‚Äòzbekiston-Belarus: 30 yil do‚Äòstlik, ishonch va hamkorlik an‚Äôanalarida‚Äù
fields.description_en:
On March 16, a round table "Uzbekistan-Belarus: 30 years in the tradition of friendship, trust and partnership" was held at the Museum of Glory in Tashkent. The event was organized by the SCO Public Diplomacy Center in Uzbekistan (Director Sabirov K.K.). The event was attended by Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the Republic of Belarus to the Republic of Uzbekistan Marinich L.A. and Chargé d'Affaires of the Embassy of the Republic of Uzbekistan in the Republic of Belarus R. D. Nazarov, as well as representatives of education, science and culture of both states. In the presentation dedicated to the 30th anniversary of the Uzbek-Belarusian diplomatic relations, a special place was given to SBUMIPTK, the importance of which for strengthening the intellectual security of Uzbekistan, the development of Belarusian-Uzbek friendship was also emphasized in his speech by the director of the SBUMIPTK, Professor I. Gancherenok

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook
fields.description_uz:
16-mart kuni poytaxtimizdagi “Shon-sharaf muzeyi”da “O‘zbekiston-Belarus: 30 yil do‘stlik, ishonch va hamkorlik an’analarida” mavzuida davra suhbati bo‘lib o‘tdi. Tadbir ShHTning O‘zbekistondagi Jamoat diplomatiyasi markazi (direktori Sabirov K.K.) tomonidan tashkil etildi. Tadbirda Belarus Respublikasining O‘zbekiston Respublikasidagi Favqulodda va Muxtor Elchisi Marinich L.A. va O‘zbekiston Respublikasining Belarus Respublikasidagi elchixonasining Muvaqqat ishlar vakili R.D.Nazarov, shuningdek, har ikki davlatning ta’lim, fan va madaniyat vakillari ishtirok etdi. O‘zbekiston-Belarus diplomatik munosabatlarining 30-yilligiga bag‘ishlangan taqdimotda O‘zbekistonning intellektual xavfsizligini mustahkamlash, belarus-o‘zbek do‘stligini rivojlantirishda muhim ahamiyatga ega bo‘lgan SUMIPTK alohida o‘rin egalladi. SUMIPTK direktori, professor I. Gancherenok

fields.description_en:
Khashar dedicated to "Navroz" holiday!

Hashar, which has been passed down from generation to generation, is an ancient tradition of our people inherited from our great ancestors.

Thus, on March 18, 2023, the team of the Belarus-Uzbekistan Joint Interdisciplinary Technical Qualification Institute took an active part in the national festival of Tashkent in order to properly welcome the Navruz national holiday and properly prepare for the month of Ramadan.

The results of the survey are not satisfactory: beautification and planting of tree saplings were actively organized in the area adjacent to the institute, sanitary pruning and whitewashing of trees was carried out, ditches were cleaned, dry branches and grass were collected and removed.

Khashar not only unites people, but also strengthens qualities such as kindness, sensitivity, humanity! But the most important thing is that such public events serve to improve the ecological and general culture of the population.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook
fields.description_uz:
"Navro'z" bayramiga bag'ishlangan xashar!

Qadimdan avloddan-avlodga o‘tib kelayotgan hashar xalqimizning buyuk ajdodlarimizdan bizga meros bo‘lib kelgan qadimiy an’anasidir.

Shunday qilib, 2023-yil 18-mart kuni Navro‘z umumxalq bayramini munosib kutib olish va Ramazon oyiga munosib tayyorgarlik ko‘rish maqsadida Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik malaka instituti jamoasi Toshkent umumxalq xasharida faol ishtirok etdi.

Hashar natijalari quvonarsiz: institutga tutash hududda obodonlashtirish va daraxt ko‘chatlarini ekish ishlari faol tashkil etildi, daraxtlarni sanitariya budama va oqlash ishlari olib borildi, ariqlar tozalandi, qurigan novdalar, o‘t-o‘lanlar yig‘ilib, olib tashlandi.

Xashar nafaqat odamlarni birlashtiradi, balki mehr-oqibat, sezgirlik, insonparvarlik kabi fazilatlarni mustahkamlaydi! Lekin eng muhimi, bunday ommaviy tadbirlar aholining ekologik va umumiy madaniyatini yuksaltirishga xizmat qilmoqda.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook

fields.description_en:
Purity, order are among the aspects that make our country more prosperous and beautiful. In this, the noble value of our people, which has been formed over the years, has an important place.

Today, on March 18, in order to properly celebrate the national holiday "Navroz" and to prepare for the blessed month of Ramadan, a national beautification and greening campaign is being held in all regions.

In addition, beautification and landscaping works were carried out in the territory of the Belarus-Uzbekistan joint intersectoral practical technical qualification institute in Tashkent.

During the year, the employees of the institute cleaned the surroundings of the institute, planted and whitened seedlings and trees, swept the area and corridors, cleaned and put in order the ditches.

It has been shown once again that it is really a symbol of neatness, organization, harmony and solidarity.

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook

fields.description_uz:
Ozodalik, poklik, saranjomlik yurtimizni yanada obod va fayzli, ko‘rkam qiluvchi jihatlardan. Bunda xalqimizning yillar davomida shakllangan ezgu qadriyati – hashar muhim o‘rin tutadi.

Bugun 18-mart kuni butun mamlakatimizda “Navro ªz” umumxalq bayramini munosib nishonlash hamda muborak Ramazon oyini qarshi olishga tayyorgarlik ko'rish maqsadida, barcha hududlarda umumxalq obodonlashtirish va ko‘kalamzorlashtirish  hashari o‘tkazilmoqda.

Shu jumladan, Toshkent shahridagi Belarus-O‘zbekiston qo‘shma tarmoqlararo amaliy texnik kvalifikatsiyalar instituti hududida ham obodonlashtirish va ko‘kalamzorlashtirish ishlari olib borildi. 

Hashar davomida institut hodimlari tomonidan institut atrofi tozalandi,  ko‘chat va daraxtlarga bahoriy ishlov berilib, oqlandi, hududdagi maydon va yo’laklar supurildi, ariqlar ichlari tozalandi va tartibga keltirildi.

Chindan ham hashar ozodalik, saranjomlik, ahillik va hamjihatligimiz ramzi ekani yana bir karra namoyon bo‘ldi

Sbumiptk.uz | Instagram | Telegram | Facebook

–ë—É–¥—É—â–µ–µ - —Å–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è! –ë–µ—Å–ø–∏–ª–æ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥–æ–≤—ã–µ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–Ω–æ–º–Ω—ã–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º—ã–µ –≤ –∫–æ—Å–º–æ—Å–µ, –∞–≤–∏–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –ø–æ–¥ –≤–æ–¥–æ–π –∏ —Ç. –¥., –±—ã–ª–∏ –≤ —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏—è –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–æ–π –Ω–∞—É—á–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏, –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–π –ì–∞–≤–∞–π—Å–∫–∏–º —É–Ω–∏–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Ç–æ–º –≤ –ú–∞–Ω–æ–∞ 15–17 –º–∞—Ä—Ç–∞.

–°–∏–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—É–º –ú–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ—é–∑–∞ —Ç–µ–æ—Ä–µ—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–∫–ª–∞–¥–Ω–æ–π –º–µ—Ö–∞–Ω–∏–∫–∏ ( IUTAM ) –ø–æ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–º—É —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—é –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—é –¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–Ω–æ–º–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º, –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–æ—Ä–æ–º –ò–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–¥–∂–∞ UH MƒÅnoa –î–∏–ª–º—É—Ä–∞—Ç–æ–º –ê–∑–∏–º–æ–≤—ã–º , —Å–æ–±—Ä–∞–ª –¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∫–∏ –≤–µ–¥—É—â–∏—Ö –Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–≤ —Å–æ –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ –º–∏—Ä–∞, –≤ —Ç–æ–º —á–∏—Å–ª–µ —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–æ–≤ –∏–∑ UH MƒÅnoa . .

–ê–∑–∏–º–æ–≤, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –±—ã–ª –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å–µ–¥–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–º —Å–∏–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—É–º–∞, –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏–ª –¥–≤–∞ –¥–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥–∞. –ü–µ—Ä–≤—ã–π –±—ã–ª –ø–æ—Å–≤—è—â–µ–Ω –Ω–∞–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—é, –Ω–∞–≤–∏–≥–∞—Ü–∏–∏, —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—é –∏ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–æ—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º —Å –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–º-–∫–æ–º–ø—å—é—Ç–µ—Ä—â–∏–∫–æ–º –ù–ê–°–ê –≠–≤–∞–Ω–æ–º –ö–∞–≤–∞–º—É—Ä–æ–π , –≤—ã–ø—É—Å–∫–Ω–∏–∫–æ–º –º–∞—à–∏–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∞–∫—É–ª—å—Ç–µ—Ç–∞ –£–Ω–∏–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Ç–∞ —à—Ç–∞—Ç–∞ –ú–∞–Ω–æ–∞ ( MS , 2016 –∏ PhD , 2020). –í—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–π –±—ã–ª –ø–æ—Å–≤—è—â–µ–Ω —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –¥–≤–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–æ—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–µ.

–í–∏—Ü–µ-–ø—Ä–µ–∑–∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç UH –ø–æ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è–º –∏ –∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ü–∏—è–º –í–∞—Å–∏–ª–∏—Å –°—ã—Ä–º–æ—Å, –ø—Ä–æ—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä UH MƒÅnoa –ú–∞–π–∫–ª –ë—Ä—É–Ω–æ, –¥–µ–∫–∞–Ω –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–¥–∂–∞ UH MƒÅnoa –ë—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–Ω –ú–æ—Ä–∏–æ–∫–∞, –ø–æ–º–æ—â–Ω–∏–∫ –¥–µ–∫–∞–Ω–∞ –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–¥–∂–∞ UH MƒÅnoa –°–æ–Ω–≥ –ß–æ–π, –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–æ—Ä–∞ –î–∏–ª–º—É—Ä–∞—Ç –ê–∑–∏–º–æ–≤, –î–∂–æ–Ω –ê–ª–ª–µ–Ω, –ü–∏—Ç–µ—Ä –ë–µ—Ä–∫–µ–ª—å–º–∞–Ω –∏ –í–µ–π–ª–∏–Ω –¶—é–π, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –¥–µ–ª–µ–≥–∞—Ü–∏—è –∏–∑ –£–∑–±–µ–∫–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞.

–ü–æ–º–æ—â–Ω–∏–∫ –¥–µ–∫–∞–Ω–∞ –°–æ–Ω–≥ –ö. –ß–æ–π —Å–∫–∞–∑–∞–ª: « –°–∏–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—É–º IUTAM –ø–æ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–º—É –Ω–∞–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—é –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—é –±—ã–ª —Å–æ–±—Ä–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º –Ω–∞ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–º —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã—Ö —É—á–µ–Ω—ã—Ö, –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –∏ —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–æ–≤, –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—é—â–∏—Ö—Å—è –Ω–æ–≤—ã–º–∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–µ–ø—Ü–∏—è–º–∏, —Ç–µ–æ—Ä–∏—è–º–∏, –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–∞–º–∏ –∏ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π —ç—Ç–∏—Ö –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –Ω–∞–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è, –Ω–µ–ª–∏–Ω–µ–π–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–∏–Ω–∞–º–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –∏ —É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –¥–≤–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è, —Å–ª–∏—è–Ω–∏—è –¥–∞—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤. –∏ –ò–ò / –º–∞—à–∏–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–≤—ã—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–Ω–æ–º–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º. –≠—Ç–æ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –¥–∞–ª–æ –Ω–∞–º –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ–æ–±—â–∞—Ç—å—Å—è —Å –¥–µ–ª–µ–≥–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π –∏–∑ –£–∑–±–µ–∫–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞, –≤–ø–µ—Ä–≤—ã–µ –¥–ª—è UH Manoa, –¥–ª—è –±–æ–ª–µ–µ —Ç–µ—Å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –≤ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è—Ö –∏ –∞–∫–∞–¥–µ–º–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –∫—Ä—É–≥–∞—Ö».

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏—è –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–∞—Å—å —Å–æ –≤—Å—Ç—É–ø–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞ –ê–∑–∏–º–æ–≤–∞ –∏ –≤—Å—Ç—É–ø–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞ –≤–∏—Ü–µ-–ø—Ä–µ–∑–∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ UH –ø–æ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è–º –∏ –∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ü–∏—è–º –í–∞—Å–∏–ª–∏—Å–∞ –õ. –°—ã—Ä–º–æ—Å–∞ . –ö—É–º—É –ë—Ä—ç–¥ –õ–∞–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏–ª –ø—Ä–∏—Å—É—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏–º –ø—Ä–µ–∑–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—é –æ –≥–∞–≤–∞–π—Å–∫–æ–π –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–µ. –õ—É–º –∏ –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è NƒÅ Mea  ªIke  ªIa —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª—è–ª–∏ —á—É–≤—Å—Ç–≤–æ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–µ–ø—Ü–∏—è–º, –∑–∞–∏–º—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º –∏–∑ –º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∑–∑—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–∞–Ω–∞–∫–∞ (–∫–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –≥–∞–≤–∞–π—Ü–µ–≤) –∞–ª–æ—Ö–∞, –∫—É–ª–µ–∞–Ω–∞ (–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å) –∏ –º–∞–ª–∞–º–∞ (–∑–∞–±–æ—Ç–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –∏ –∑–∞—â–∏—â–∞—Ç—å), —Å–æ —Å–≤—è–∑—å—é –¥—Ä–µ–≤–Ω–∏—Ö –º—É–¥—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω—è–µ–º–æ–π –≤ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–µ –∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–µ.

«–û–¥–Ω–∏–º –∏–∑ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –∞—Å–ø–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ —Å–∏–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—É–º–∞ —è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏—Å—Ç–æ–∫–æ–≤ —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –¥–ª—è –Ω–∞–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –Ω–∞–≤–∏–≥–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–Ω–æ–º–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –≤ —Å–≤—è–∑–∏ —Å –≥–∞–≤–∞–π—Å–∫–∏–º –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–Ω—ã–º –Ω–∞—Å–ª–µ–¥–∏–µ–º –º–æ—Ä—Å–∫–∏—Ö –ø—É—Ç–µ—à–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π, —Ç–∞–∫–∏–º –∫–∞–∫ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è –•–æ–∫—É–ª–µ–∞», — —Å–∫–∞–∑–∞–ª –ê–∑–∏–º–æ–≤ . «–≠—Ç–æ –º–µ—Ä–æ–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—Ç –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏—é —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –Ω–∞—Å–ª–µ–¥–∏—è, –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–æ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–∏ —Å—Ç—É–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –º–æ–ª–æ–¥–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ–∫–æ–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤ –∏–∑—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Ä—É–±–µ–∂–µ–π –Ω–∞—É–∫–∏ –∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–∏».

–ë–æ—Ä—å–±–∞ —Å –≤—Ä–µ–¥–æ–Ω–æ—Å–Ω—ã–º–∏ –¥—Ä–æ–Ω–∞–º–∏

–ù–µ—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π UH –±—ã–ª–∏ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–∏ –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞—é—â–∏—Ö –Ω–∞ —Ç—Ä–µ—Ö–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏, –≤ —Ç–æ–º —á–∏—Å–ª–µ –î—ç–≤–∏–¥ –õ—è–Ω , —Å—Ç—É–¥–µ–Ω—Ç –º–∞–≥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç—É—Ä—ã –ø–æ —ç–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–µ, –∏ –ò–Ω—Ñ—ç–π –î—É–Ω , –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–æ—Ä —ç–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –∏ –∫–æ–º–ø—å—é—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–π –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∏, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –æ–±–∞ –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞–ª–∏ –Ω–∞ –¥—Ä–æ–Ω–∞—Ö. –ò—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–∏–ª–∏ —É–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥ –∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –¥—Ä–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –∑–∞—à–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ç—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫–∞ –º–µ–∂–¥—É –¥—Ä–æ–Ω–æ–º –∏ –µ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª–ª–µ—Ä–æ–º. –≠—Ç–æ—Ç –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –Ω–∞—Ü–µ–ª–µ–Ω –Ω–∞ –ø–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–±–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å–∫–∏–µ –±–µ—Å–ø–∏–ª–æ—Ç–Ω–∏–∫–∏, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ —Å—Ç–∞–ª–∏ –¥–µ—à–µ–≤—ã–º –∏ —ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–º –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º –¥–ª—è –∑–ª–æ–Ω–∞–º–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π, —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö –∫–∞–∫ –≤—Ç–æ—Ä–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –æ–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –≤–æ–∑–¥—É—à–Ω–æ–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ, –≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–µ–∑–∞–∫–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –Ω–∞–±–ª—é–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∞ –≤–∑—Ä—ã–≤—á–∞—Ç—ã—Ö –≤–µ—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤. –î–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥ –ø–æ–¥ –Ω–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º «–ò–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–±–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å–∫–∏—Ö –¥—Ä–æ–Ω–æ–≤ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é –∑–∞—à–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ç—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫–∞» –±—ã–ª —Ç–µ–º–æ–π –¥–∏—Å—Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –õ—è–Ω–∞ –æ—Å–µ–Ω—å—é 2022 –≥–æ–¥–∞.

«–í—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞ —ç—Ç–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏ —Å—Ç–∞–ª–æ –¥–ª—è –º–µ–Ω—è –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –∏ –ø–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω–æ–π –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é, — —Å–∫–∞–∑–∞–ª –õ—è–Ω. «–Ø –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∏–ª —Ü–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–∑—ã–≤—ã –æ—Ç –º–Ω–æ–≥–∏—Ö —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–æ–≤ –≤ —Å–≤–æ–∏—Ö –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç—è—Ö, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –æ–∫–∞–∑–∞–ª–∏—Å—å —á—Ä–µ–∑–≤—ã—á–∞–π–Ω–æ –ø–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∏ –º–æ—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ –¥–ª—è –º–æ–∏—Ö –±—É–¥—É—â–∏—Ö –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π. –£ –º–µ–Ω—è —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –±—ã–ª–∞ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∏–∑–≤–ª–µ—á—å —É—Ä–æ–∫–∏ –∏–∑ –º–Ω–æ–≥–∏—Ö –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–µ–∑–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–π –∏ –æ–±—Å—É–¥–∏—Ç—å –¥–µ—Ç–∞–ª–∏ —Å–æ —Å–ø–∏–∫–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏. –í —Ü–µ–ª–æ–º, —ç—Ç–æ –±—ã–ª–∞ –æ—á–µ–Ω—å –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∞».

–í–ø–µ—Ä–≤—ã–µ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –≤ 1922 –≥–æ–¥—É, IUTAM —Å–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è –Ω–∞—Å—á–∏—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 500 –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö —É—á–µ–Ω—ã—Ö, –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–∏—Ö –æ–∫–æ–ª–æ 50 —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω –∏ 20 –¥–æ—á–µ—Ä–Ω–∏—Ö –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã—Ö –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–π.

— –ú–∞—Ä–∫ –ê—Ä–∞–∫–∞–∫–∏

fields.description_en:
The conference was held at the East-West Center.

The future is now! Unmanned, cutting-edge autonomous systems used in space, aviation, underwater and more were the focus of an international science conference hosted by the University of Hawai ªi at MƒÅnoa, March 15–17.

Organized and managed by UH MƒÅnoa College of Engineering Professor Dilmurat Azimov, the International Union of Theoretical and Applied Mechanics (IUTAM) Symposium on Optimal Guidance and Control for Autonomous Systems brought together dozens of the leading innovators from around the world, including experts from UH MƒÅnoa.

Azimov, who was the symposium chair, presented two talks. The first was on guidance, navigation, control and robotic technologies with NASA computer engineer Evan Kawamura, a UH MƒÅnoa mechanical engineering alumnus (MS, 2016 and PhD, 2020). The second was on motion stability and robotic technologies.

UH VP for Research and Innovation Vassilis Syrmos, UH MƒÅnoa Provost Michael Bruno, UH MƒÅnoa College of Engineering Dean Brennon Morioka, UH MƒÅnoa College of Engineering Assistant Dean Song Choi, Professors Dilmurat Azimov, John Allen, Peter Berkelman and Weilin Qu, and a delegation from Uzbekistan.

Assistant Dean Song K. Choi said, “The IUTAM Symposium on Optimal Guidance and Control was a high level gathering of international scientists, engineers and experts engaged in novel concepts, theories, methods and implementation of these optimal guidance and control, nonlinear dynamic systems and motion stability, sensor fusion and AI/machine learning to further the performance of autonomous systems. It also gave us the opportunity to engage with a delegation from Uzbekistan, a first for UH MƒÅnoa, for greater collaboration in research and academics.”

The conference kicked off with an introduction by Azimov and opening remarks by UH Vice President for Research and Innovation Vassilis L. Syrmos. Kumu Brad Lum delivered a Hawaiian cultural presentation to the attendees. Lum and the organization NƒÅ Mea  ªIke  ªIa shared a sense of understanding and responsibility through the concepts provided from the kƒÅnaka (Native Hawaiian) world view of aloha, kuleana (responsibility) and mƒÅlama (to care for and protect), with the connection of ancient wisdom applied to engineering and technology.

“One of the main aspects of the symposium is to understand and recognize the origins of today’s guidance and navigation solutions for autonomous systems in association with the Hawaiian cultural heritage of voyages in the seas, such as the story of H≈çk≈´le ªa,” Azimov said. “This event promotes an understanding of this heritage especially among the students and younger generation in exploring new frontiers of science and engineering.”

Targeting malicious drones

Several UH researchers were among the presenters of the three-day conference, including David Liang, an electrical engineering master’s student, and Yingfei Dong, electrical and computer engineering professor, who both presented on drones. The researchers proposed a unique method to identify drones based on the encrypted traffic between a drone and its controller. This method would target consumer drones that have become a low-cost and effective tool for malicious activity, such as intruding on restricted airspaces, conducting illegal surveillance and dispatching explosives. The talk titled “Identifying Consumer Drones via Encrypted Traffic,” was Liang’s thesis topic in fall 2022.

“Presenting at this conference was a new and rewarding opportunity for me,” Liang said. “I received valuable feedback from many experts in their fields, which was extremely helpful and motivational for my future research. I also had the opportunity to learn from many of the other presentations and to discuss details with the speakers. Overall, it was a very educationally-rewarding challenge.”

First established in 1922, IUTAM today has more than 500 active scientists who represent about 50 countries and 20 affiliated international organizations.

—By Marc Arakaki

–ë—É–¥—É—â–µ–µ - —Å–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è! –ë–µ—Å–ø–∏–ª–æ—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–¥–æ–≤—ã–µ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–Ω–æ–º–Ω—ã–µ —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—ã, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É–µ–º—ã–µ –≤ –∫–æ—Å–º–æ—Å–µ, –∞–≤–∏–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –ø–æ–¥ –≤–æ–¥–æ–π –∏ —Ç. –¥., –±—ã–ª–∏ –≤ —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–µ –≤–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏—è –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–æ–π –Ω–∞—É—á–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏, –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–π –ì–∞–≤–∞–π—Å–∫–∏–º —É–Ω–∏–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Ç–æ–º –≤ –ú–∞–Ω–æ–∞ 15–17 –º–∞—Ä—Ç–∞.

–°–∏–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—É–º –ú–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ—é–∑–∞ —Ç–µ–æ—Ä–µ—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–æ–π –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–∫–ª–∞–¥–Ω–æ–π –º–µ—Ö–∞–Ω–∏–∫–∏ ( IUTAM ) –ø–æ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–º—É —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—é –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—é –¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–Ω–æ–º–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º, –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª—è–µ–º—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–æ—Ä–æ–º –ò–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–¥–∂–∞ UH MƒÅnoa –î–∏–ª–º—É—Ä–∞—Ç–æ–º –ê–∑–∏–º–æ–≤—ã–º , —Å–æ–±—Ä–∞–ª –¥–µ—Å—è—Ç–∫–∏ –≤–µ–¥—É—â–∏—Ö –Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–≤ —Å–æ –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ –º–∏—Ä–∞, –≤ —Ç–æ–º —á–∏—Å–ª–µ —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–æ–≤ –∏–∑ UH MƒÅnoa . .

–ê–∑–∏–º–æ–≤, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –±—ã–ª –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å–µ–¥–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–º —Å–∏–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—É–º–∞, –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏–ª –¥–≤–∞ –¥–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥–∞. –ü–µ—Ä–≤—ã–π –±—ã–ª –ø–æ—Å–≤—è—â–µ–Ω –Ω–∞–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—é, –Ω–∞–≤–∏–≥–∞—Ü–∏–∏, —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—é –∏ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–æ—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è–º —Å –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–º-–∫–æ–º–ø—å—é—Ç–µ—Ä—â–∏–∫–æ–º –ù–ê–°–ê –≠–≤–∞–Ω–æ–º –ö–∞–≤–∞–º—É—Ä–æ–π , –≤—ã–ø—É—Å–∫–Ω–∏–∫–æ–º –º–∞—à–∏–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∞–∫—É–ª—å—Ç–µ—Ç–∞ –£–Ω–∏–≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—Ç–µ—Ç–∞ —à—Ç–∞—Ç–∞ –ú–∞–Ω–æ–∞ ( MS , 2016 –∏ PhD , 2020). –í—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–π –±—ã–ª –ø–æ—Å–≤—è—â–µ–Ω —Å—Ç–∞–±–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –¥–≤–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ —Ä–æ–±–æ—Ç–æ—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–µ.

–í–∏—Ü–µ-–ø—Ä–µ–∑–∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç UH –ø–æ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è–º –∏ –∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ü–∏—è–º –í–∞—Å–∏–ª–∏—Å –°—ã—Ä–º–æ—Å, –ø—Ä–æ—Ä–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä UH MƒÅnoa –ú–∞–π–∫–ª –ë—Ä—É–Ω–æ, –¥–µ–∫–∞–Ω –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–¥–∂–∞ UH MƒÅnoa –ë—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–Ω –ú–æ—Ä–∏–æ–∫–∞, –ø–æ–º–æ—â–Ω–∏–∫ –¥–µ–∫–∞–Ω–∞ –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–≥–æ –∫–æ–ª–ª–µ–¥–∂–∞ UH MƒÅnoa –°–æ–Ω–≥ –ß–æ–π, –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–æ—Ä–∞ –î–∏–ª–º—É—Ä–∞—Ç –ê–∑–∏–º–æ–≤, –î–∂–æ–Ω –ê–ª–ª–µ–Ω, –ü–∏—Ç–µ—Ä –ë–µ—Ä–∫–µ–ª—å–º–∞–Ω –∏ –í–µ–π–ª–∏–Ω –¶—é–π, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –¥–µ–ª–µ–≥–∞—Ü–∏—è –∏–∑ –£–∑–±–µ–∫–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞.

–ü–æ–º–æ—â–Ω–∏–∫ –¥–µ–∫–∞–Ω–∞ –°–æ–Ω–≥ –ö. –ß–æ–π —Å–∫–∞–∑–∞–ª: « –°–∏–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—É–º IUTAM –ø–æ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–º—É –Ω–∞–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—é –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—é –±—ã–ª —Å–æ–±—Ä–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º –Ω–∞ –≤—ã—Å–æ–∫–æ–º —É—Ä–æ–≤–Ω–µ –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã—Ö —É—á–µ–Ω—ã—Ö, –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–æ–≤ –∏ —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–æ–≤, –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞—é—â–∏—Ö—Å—è –Ω–æ–≤—ã–º–∏ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–µ–ø—Ü–∏—è–º–∏, —Ç–µ–æ—Ä–∏—è–º–∏, –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–∞–º–∏ –∏ —Ä–µ–∞–ª–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π —ç—Ç–∏—Ö –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã—Ö –Ω–∞–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ —É–ø—Ä–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è, –Ω–µ–ª–∏–Ω–µ–π–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–∏–Ω–∞–º–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –∏ —É—Å—Ç–æ–π—á–∏–≤–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –¥–≤–∏–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è, —Å–ª–∏—è–Ω–∏—è –¥–∞—Ç—á–∏–∫–æ–≤. –∏ –ò–ò / –º–∞—à–∏–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –æ–±—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–≤—ã—à–µ–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∞–≤—Ç–æ–Ω–æ–º–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º. –≠—Ç–æ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –¥–∞–ª–æ –Ω–∞–º –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–æ–æ–±—â–∞—Ç—å—Å—è —Å –¥–µ–ª–µ–≥–∞—Ü–∏–µ–π –∏–∑ –£–∑–±–µ–∫–∏—Å—Ç–∞–Ω–∞, –≤–ø–µ—Ä–≤—ã–µ –¥–ª—è UH Manoa, –¥–ª—è –±–æ–ª–µ–µ —Ç–µ—Å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–æ—Ç—Ä—É–¥–Ω–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∞ –≤ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è—Ö –∏ –∞–∫–∞–¥–µ–º–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏—Ö –∫—Ä—É–≥–∞—Ö».

–ö–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏—è –Ω–∞—á–∞–ª–∞—Å—å —Å–æ –≤—Å—Ç—É–ø–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞ –ê–∑–∏–º–æ–≤–∞ –∏ –≤—Å—Ç—É–ø–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞ –≤–∏—Ü–µ-–ø—Ä–µ–∑–∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–∞ UH –ø–æ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è–º –∏ –∏–Ω–Ω–æ–≤–∞—Ü–∏—è–º –í–∞—Å–∏–ª–∏—Å–∞ –õ. –°—ã—Ä–º–æ—Å–∞ . –ö—É–º—É –ë—Ä—ç–¥ –õ–∞–º –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–∏–ª –ø—Ä–∏—Å—É—Ç—Å—Ç–≤—É—é—â–∏–º –ø—Ä–µ–∑–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏—é –æ –≥–∞–≤–∞–π—Å–∫–æ–π –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–µ. –õ—É–º –∏ –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏—è NƒÅ Mea  ªIke  ªIa —Ä–∞–∑–¥–µ–ª—è–ª–∏ —á—É–≤—Å—Ç–≤–æ –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä—è –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–µ–ø—Ü–∏—è–º, –∑–∞–∏–º—Å—Ç–≤–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º –∏–∑ –º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–æ–∑–∑—Ä–µ–Ω–∏—è –∫–∞–Ω–∞–∫–∞ (–∫–æ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –≥–∞–≤–∞–π—Ü–µ–≤) –∞–ª–æ—Ö–∞, –∫—É–ª–µ–∞–Ω–∞ (–æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å) –∏ –º–∞–ª–∞–º–∞ (–∑–∞–±–æ—Ç–∏—Ç—å—Å—è –∏ –∑–∞—â–∏—â–∞—Ç—å), —Å–æ —Å–≤—è–∑—å—é –¥—Ä–µ–≤–Ω–∏—Ö –º—É–¥—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –ø—Ä–∏–º–µ–Ω—è–µ–º–æ–π –≤ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–µ –∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–µ.

«–û–¥–Ω–∏–º –∏–∑ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã—Ö –∞—Å–ø–µ–∫—Ç–æ–≤ —Å–∏–º–ø–æ–∑–∏—É–º–∞ —è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–∑–Ω–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∏—Å—Ç–æ–∫–æ–≤ —Å–æ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ—à–µ–Ω–∏–π –¥–ª—è –Ω–∞–≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –Ω–∞–≤–∏–≥–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –¥–ª—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–Ω–æ–º–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º –≤ —Å–≤—è–∑–∏ —Å –≥–∞–≤–∞–π—Å–∫–∏–º –∫—É–ª—å—Ç—É—Ä–Ω—ã–º –Ω–∞—Å–ª–µ–¥–∏–µ–º –º–æ—Ä—Å–∫–∏—Ö –ø—É—Ç–µ—à–µ—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π, —Ç–∞–∫–∏–º –∫–∞–∫ –∏—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–∏—è –•–æ–∫—É–ª–µ–∞», — —Å–∫–∞–∑–∞–ª –ê–∑–∏–º–æ–≤ . «–≠—Ç–æ –º–µ—Ä–æ–ø—Ä–∏—è—Ç–∏–µ —Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±—Å—Ç–≤—É–µ—Ç –ø–æ–Ω–∏–º–∞–Ω–∏—é —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –Ω–∞—Å–ª–µ–¥–∏—è, –æ—Å–æ–±–µ–Ω–Ω–æ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–∏ —Å—Ç—É–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –∏ –º–æ–ª–æ–¥–æ–≥–æ –ø–æ–∫–æ–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤ –∏–∑—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –Ω–æ–≤—ã—Ö —Ä—É–±–µ–∂–µ–π –Ω–∞—É–∫–∏ –∏ —Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–∏».

–ë–æ—Ä—å–±–∞ —Å –≤—Ä–µ–¥–æ–Ω–æ—Å–Ω—ã–º–∏ –¥—Ä–æ–Ω–∞–º–∏

–ù–µ—Å–∫–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–µ–π UH –±—ã–ª–∏ —Å—Ä–µ–¥–∏ –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞—é—â–∏—Ö –Ω–∞ —Ç—Ä–µ—Ö–¥–Ω–µ–≤–Ω–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏, –≤ —Ç–æ–º —á–∏—Å–ª–µ –î—ç–≤–∏–¥ –õ—è–Ω , —Å—Ç—É–¥–µ–Ω—Ç –º–∞–≥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ç—É—Ä—ã –ø–æ —ç–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–µ, –∏ –ò–Ω—Ñ—ç–π –î—É–Ω , –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–æ—Ä —ç–ª–µ–∫—Ç—Ä–æ—Ç–µ—Ö–Ω–∏–∫–∏ –∏ –∫–æ–º–ø—å—é—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω–æ–π –∏–Ω–∂–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏–∏, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –æ–±–∞ –≤—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–∞–ª–∏ –Ω–∞ –¥—Ä–æ–Ω–∞—Ö. –ò—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–∏ –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–∏–ª–∏ —É–Ω–∏–∫–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥ –∏–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –¥—Ä–æ–Ω–æ–≤ –Ω–∞ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–µ –∑–∞—à–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ç—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫–∞ –º–µ–∂–¥—É –¥—Ä–æ–Ω–æ–º –∏ –µ–≥–æ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª–ª–µ—Ä–æ–º. –≠—Ç–æ—Ç –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –Ω–∞—Ü–µ–ª–µ–Ω –Ω–∞ –ø–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–±–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å–∫–∏–µ –±–µ—Å–ø–∏–ª–æ—Ç–Ω–∏–∫–∏, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ —Å—Ç–∞–ª–∏ –¥–µ—à–µ–≤—ã–º –∏ —ç—Ñ—Ñ–µ–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–º –∏–Ω—Å—Ç—Ä—É–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–º –¥–ª—è –∑–ª–æ–Ω–∞–º–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –¥–µ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∏–π, —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö –∫–∞–∫ –≤—Ç–æ—Ä–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –≤ –æ–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ –≤–æ–∑–¥—É—à–Ω–æ–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω—Å—Ç–≤–æ, –≤–µ–¥–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–µ–∑–∞–∫–æ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ –Ω–∞–±–ª—é–¥–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ—Ç–ø—Ä–∞–≤–∫–∞ –≤–∑—Ä—ã–≤—á–∞—Ç—ã—Ö –≤–µ—â–µ—Å—Ç–≤. –î–æ–∫–ª–∞–¥ –ø–æ–¥ –Ω–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º «–ò–¥–µ–Ω—Ç–∏—Ñ–∏–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–±–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å–∫–∏—Ö –¥—Ä–æ–Ω–æ–≤ —Å –ø–æ–º–æ—â—å—é –∑–∞—à–∏—Ñ—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ç—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏–∫–∞» –±—ã–ª —Ç–µ–º–æ–π –¥–∏—Å—Å–µ—Ä—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –õ—è–Ω–∞ –æ—Å–µ–Ω—å—é 2022 –≥–æ–¥–∞.

«–í—ã—Å—Ç—É–ø–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ –Ω–∞ —ç—Ç–æ–π –∫–æ–Ω—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ–Ω—Ü–∏–∏ —Å—Ç–∞–ª–æ –¥–ª—è –º–µ–Ω—è –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –∏ –ø–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω–æ–π –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é, — —Å–∫–∞–∑–∞–ª –õ—è–Ω. «–Ø –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∏–ª —Ü–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–∑—ã–≤—ã –æ—Ç –º–Ω–æ–≥–∏—Ö —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–æ–≤ –≤ —Å–≤–æ–∏—Ö –æ–±–ª–∞—Å—Ç—è—Ö, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –æ–∫–∞–∑–∞–ª–∏—Å—å —á—Ä–µ–∑–≤—ã—á–∞–π–Ω–æ –ø–æ–ª–µ–∑–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∏ –º–æ—Ç–∏–≤–∞—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ –¥–ª—è –º–æ–∏—Ö –±—É–¥—É—â–∏—Ö –∏—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–π. –£ –º–µ–Ω—è —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –±—ã–ª–∞ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∏–∑–≤–ª–µ—á—å —É—Ä–æ–∫–∏ –∏–∑ –º–Ω–æ–≥–∏—Ö –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–µ–∑–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ü–∏–π –∏ –æ–±—Å—É–¥–∏—Ç—å –¥–µ—Ç–∞–ª–∏ —Å–æ —Å–ø–∏–∫–µ—Ä–∞–º–∏. –í —Ü–µ–ª–æ–º, —ç—Ç–æ –±—ã–ª–∞ –æ—á–µ–Ω—å –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–∞—è –∑–∞–¥–∞—á–∞».

–í–ø–µ—Ä–≤—ã–µ —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –≤ 1922 –≥–æ–¥—É, IUTAM —Å–µ–≥–æ–¥–Ω—è –Ω–∞—Å—á–∏—Ç—ã–≤–∞–µ—Ç –±–æ–ª–µ–µ 500 –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã—Ö —É—á–µ–Ω—ã—Ö, –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è—é—â–∏—Ö –æ–∫–æ–ª–æ 50 —Å—Ç—Ä–∞–Ω –∏ 20 –¥–æ—á–µ—Ä–Ω–∏—Ö –º–µ–∂–¥—É–Ω–∞—Ä–æ–¥–Ω—ã—Ö –æ—Ä–≥–∞–Ω–∏–∑–∞—Ü–∏–π.
